DataElement.preferredName: Other Transfer Genetic Or Clonality Abnormality Laboratory Procedure Tissue Donor And/Or Product Performed Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not the tissue donor and or product was tested for other transferable genetic or clonal abnormalities.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Other Transfer Genetic Or Clonality Abnormality Laboratory Procedure Tissue Donor And/Or Product Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._The act of conveying or transporting from one place to another._Having to do with information that is passed from parents to offspring through genes in sperm and egg cells._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Related by descent from a single progenitor cell._A condition that differs from the usual physical or mental state._Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting._Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person._Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid._The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced._Executed and carried through to completion.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Other Transfer Genetic Or Clonality Abnormality Laboratory Procedure
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.:The act of conveying or transporting from one place to another.:Having to do with information that is passed from parents to offspring through genes in sperm and egg cells.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:Related by descent from a single progenitor cell.:A condition that differs from the usual physical or mental state.:Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
The act of conveying or transporting from one place to another.
Having to do with information that is passed from parents to offspring through genes in sperm and egg cells.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Related by descent from a single progenitor cell.
A condition that differs from the usual physical or mental state.
Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

Property.preferredDefinition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.:Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid.:The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.:Executed and carried through to completion.

Concepts.definition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.
Used to indicate that either or both of two items or options may be valid.
The end result of a manufacturing process; anything that is produced.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unk ND NA Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes, no, unknown, not done or not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or completed.

Concepts.definition: Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or not been completed.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Not Done Not Applicable Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.:Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or completed.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.
Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or not been completed.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
